item.description:
Join Tina Grinold and Sandy Glassman as they lead you through the deliciousness of eating vegetarian. Learn why a vegetarian lifestyle is one of the best things you can do for yourself, physically and spiritually. Then sample an array of vegetarian delights from smoothies to deserts. See why today going veg couldn't be easier. 

Tina and Sandy are long-time vegetarians. They are familiar with the broad scope of vegetarian cuisine and the wide varieties of flavors it offers. Tina has been vegetarian since birth; Sandy came to it mid-life. They both feel that adapting a vegetarian lifestyle doesn't mean "giving up" anything. Rather it's opening a door to a whole new array of foods and flavors from classic American to ethnic dishes from all over the world.

group.name: The Science of Spirituality Meditation Meetup

item.name: A Taste of Vegetarianism
